amazing game please play this

I never liked the Half life series, just gotten a pc and something deep inside wanted to try them here tough, so it began, i downloaded the demo and played through "RavenHolm" I was not dissapointed, straight out of the way, let's get clear into something Half Life 2 it's not a game that was design for console and it shows as you play to one of the most incredible control schemes to ever grace gaming, it flows so well, playing it at 120 frame rates per second or more, having everything maxed out and beign left with a big smile after shooting a tank with the legendary gravity gun, a experience like this one can only presented in a game with such fashion as it is Half Life 2.

You don't need to think twice before buying this game, try it for yourself, download the demo, you can't disagree. It may have it's moments of infinite boredom carrying along with the usual and empty slide of linearity and driving sections that just want to make you rip your hair off, but setting those complains aside, Half Life 2 it's a most play, and an entity in what you can manage to show and do with game design.
Half life 2 is the Best game ive ever played. hands down
Плохая игра - так никто и не смог сделать лучше, даже сами разработчики

It's Half-Life 2. What else is there to say? It has a great story that continues several years after the events of Half-Life. It has the incredibly tight gunplay and movement that all source games are known for, and it has some awkward to control vehicles like every other fps out there as well. The vehicles you get aren't too bad though and you understand how they work reletively fast after you crash a few times. The game is most definitely overrated, but it is a very good game regardless of that. If you're looking for a good story buy this game. If you're looking for great gameplay buy this game. If you're looking for a well polished cinematic experience buy this game. If you're looking for waiting years for a sequal buy this game. If you have more money than you know what to do with buy this game (on sale of course).

This has to be my favorite game series ever made and ever will be. This game is a marvel. It has nearly everything that you could want in a shooter, lots of action, ever changing events, Freakin' Gordon Freeman. Really this game has superb graphics for its time and still has good graphics for being 2014. This game is a gem along with Half-Life. The entire Half-Life franchise is amazing and should be bought weither you enjoy it or not. 

Seriously though, it is one of the best games I have ever played and will ever play. I cannot recommend this game enough. I would replay this game any time, any day, anywhere. It deserves a great score and personally should have a Metacritic of 100 in my opinion. This game, its a 100/10. Perfect game! Great job Valve! Now you know what we want..
I recommend this game.

Written as a cringy pre-teen in 2014

 {Just as dark and compelling as its predacessor. Keeps the basic story elements the same but adds new characters and a new enviroment, instead of the steel corridors of black mesa you wil be in the open. But do not play this game if you have not atleast played through half of the first game. Half-life 2 had a greater effect on me because I had played the first one. But Play this today or soon, it is truly a special game.}

Written as a cynical edgelord in 2018
     While I still enjoy the game, its flaws have become more apparent to me. Some things in this game boil down to "Ooh look at me, I have a physics engine, look at me place a brick on this teeter-totter, yay puzzle complete", which really wears out; and quickly too. It was my first modern fps, so I adored it, but I have seen modernism done so much better in other games. The story is great, dark, mysterious, but not without hope. The enemies are pretty cookie cutter, which is a shame because the first game had loads of interest poured into the monsters. The combine AI are laughably easy, and kind of boring to fight after awhile. Game can really shine now and then, feeling pretty epic. Long treks by vehicle were fun at first but break up the gameplay. Still great, and Is fun first play through. Graphically, looks great for 2004, but not as good looking as DOOM 3 in some aspects. Recomend you play the first game, well, first. First game is my favorite, only have 3 or so hours at time of writing on steam, but have hundreds on retail cd or ps2 re-release. The expansions, episode 1 and 2 outshine this one, but those will not make sense story wise without this one. 8.5/10

Fun

Possibly the greatest game to have ever been released...

I completed Half-Life in 2013 and after being absolutely thrilled with it's amazing story, plot and gameplay I immediately loaded up Half-Life 2. Normally as a rule of thumb a successor title in a series never quite touches the audience the way the first did; no matter how good it is. This is one of the rare exceptions where the successor title is possibly even better than the first which was truly remarkable.

Released in 2004, this game still has graphics that made my relatively new computer bought in 2009 struggle on full graphics settings under certain shadow conditions. The level of detail in the world is incredible, and one thing this game has that lacks in almost every title in existance out there right now is the atmosphere it creates. Something about the game really draws you into the world, it's completely enveloping and makes you really feel like you're walking through the streets... it's a sensation that cannot be described, one must play the game in order to appreciate the level of intricacy that sets this game apart from the rest. I have yet to even complete this game, and I fear the day that I do, because I don't want this franchise to end!! Truly a masterpiece.

Although I have many long-standing favourite titles, such as Gran Turismo 1, MediEvil, etc. I feel compelled to say that this game genuinely possibly tops all other games that I have played. It is simply magnificant. I would reccomend the Half-Life series to not only to gamers, but to anyone who appreciates a spectacular story. This is truly art.
Super nice game, a nice campaign and some nice MODS for it...

Игра, которая в свое время перевернула мое представление о играх. Это была не просто игра, это было откровение: атмосфера, сюжет, геймплэй, все было на высоте. На высоте и осталось. Эта игра - один из немногих представителей индустрии, который не стареет. Игра стоит своих денег. Единственный минус, это русская озвучка. В версии 2004-го она была потрясающая, голоса были прекрасно подобраны и актеры постарались, но вот в версии orange box, озвучку по каким-то причинам сменили. Голоса которые уже всех затрахали режут слух, да еще и не соотвествуют персонажам.

One of the greatest story driven FPS games you will ever play. By 2014 standards the graphics have dated a bit but the story of Gordon Freeman and the world Valve have created still put the narrative of most modern day FPS games to shame. Everyone keeps telling you to play this game so just play it already!

Half-Life 2 is one of those games that everyone seems to have, but not everyone has played. I still get surprised whenever I come across someone who spends a lot of time playing games, but hasn't finished (or even played) Half-Life 2.

The story telling in this game is fantastic. The story, characters and levels are well developed and it's clear just how much time went into making the game. I love all the detail put into level design, character development and design, and voice acting.

Some people think the graphics are a little dated, which is true. It's a game from 2004. But if anything, I think it adds to the feel of the game. Additionally, what game will never have it's graphics dated? Technology changes people, gosh.

If you have Half-Life 2 in your steam library but haven't yet played or are yet to acquire a copy, I strongly recommend giving it a shot. You won't regret it. You'd better be quick though, you'd want to finish it before Half-Life 3 is released!

And of course you've gotta love some ABHing, wall climbing and grenade jumping while speedrunning!

Super highly recommended!

If you like fps games, or are tryng to get in to them, this is the game for you. With a great story and a huge amount of action, this game has you on your toes, just wondering what's around the corner. You're gordon freeman, a theoretical physicist who worked at black mesa, but if you want to know his back story, play the first game. Anyway, you are place into city 17, and you'll quickly find that earth has been taken over by a race known as the combine. Once you find your way to dr. Kliener's lab, that's when it gets interesting. My personal favorite weapon is the gravity gun, picking up stuff and launching it is very fun and makes for some interesting gameplay The one downside is that sometimes it can be difficult to get past some areas but most of the time it's not too dificult. It has just the right amount of challenge to it.

This game is incredible. The world is deep, and engaging. The controls, I didn't even realize I was hitting the right buttons because they are so natural it is amazing. When I got stuck, I just explored a bit and it felt like I really was improvising a solution, and not like I was preforming a task designed by a developer. The immersion is amazing in that respect. It doesn't just feel like a game, it feels like world. Creating a world even more real than many major RPGs such as Elder Scrolls (a series I love to no end) and as a result it make everything else all the more enjoyable.

Even though Gordon Freeman never says a word, he feels real in a way I can't really explain. It might be because everyone reacts to you so realistically, not to mention no one seems to do anything that gives away the fact they are in a game, characters seems to genuinly fear death, and no one seems to have any information they can't explain in a acceptable, and reasonable manner.

Next I have to say this game makes full use of newer graphic technologies, making it look amazing even with the lowest graphic settings I was forced to use with my less than amazing laptop I had a better visual experience than any of these fancy new games on console. It is amazing what we can do with graphics these days... Oh wait... this game is 9 and a half years years old as of the writing of this guide. Well then, that makes me wonder why everyother game has such terrible graphics. Step up your game Call of Duty, not only is Half-Life 2 a better shooter, with a deeper storyline, it also makes you look horrible visually. Yes, on the lowest settings this game has graphics that I find more impressive than the latest generation of consoles have had to show. It also runs amazingly well compared to games with worst graphics. I got about an average of 50fps, while Skyrim, I am lucky to hit a stable 30fps. So for preformace, this game sets the standard that should be considered minium.

Now to look at some other aspects of this game:

* The controller support is good for those who prefer it. However the keyboard and mouse controllers are good even for people who are more used to controllers.
* Animation is beautiful, Valve managed to make motion and behavior look and feel natural.
* AI is brillant. Enemies don't just charge at you, they coordinate, and will attack at your week points, and when fighting with a group of allies the enemy will focus on the most explosed members of your squad. They will hold their ground so you can't approach, then strike when you switch to a weapon that offers less range, while also keeping you at a distance.
* Difficulty is more than just damage and health, as you play on harder difficulties, the AI improves. It makes the game harder, rather than just grindier.

All in all, 10/10

Irgendwie bereuenswert, dass ich das Spiel erst 10 jahre nach seinem Erscheinen gekauft habe....

das Spiel hat mich fürs Durchspielen gute 12 Stunden gekostet. heutige Shooter sollten sich daran mal was abgucken.
Das gebiet in dem man sich bewegt ist abwechslungsreich. Ob weitläufiges Gelände, oder hektischer Häuserkampf, alles ist vertreten. Gelegentliche Rätsel und Jump/-Run Abschnitte sind ebenfalls vorhanden.
Außerdem habe ich mich auf die Fahrzeug-passagen im Spiel sehr gefreut. meine Erwartungen wurden nicht enttäuscht. das Fahren geht gut von der Hand und ist eine wilkommene Abwechslung zur ´´normalen´´ fortbewegung.

Einziger Abzug: Irgendwie habe ich die Waffenvielfalt von Half-Life: Opposing Force vermisst. Trozdem ist auch in Half-Life 2 eine Vielzahl an Waffen Nutzbar, die sich allesamt gut anfühlen.

Ein Multiplayer in dem Spiel wäre auch nicht schlecht gewesen. ich sehe Förmlich mich und meine Freunde, wie wir uns gegenseitig mit Toiletten und dosen bewerfen :D
Leider muss man sich den erst extra dazukaufen.....

Alles in allem ein sehr gelungenes Spiel und eine klare kaufempfehlung aller Shooter-fans meinerseits.

I recommend this game with CAUTION. From what I've played this game supports only one playstyle. If you're not running around constantly dodging bullets and getting up in peoples' faces (aliens, whatever), you're DEAD. I appreciate the lack of regenerating health, though. Half-Life 2 features some of the most annoying enemies ever. They have no personality whatsoever (unlike Wheatley from Portal 2 or the enemies in Halo). Game options could have a "very low to ultra" option to save time. There is little variety in the 3 hours I've played.

The story is all right. I'm neither utterly bored by it or blown away. Aliens, resistance, the usual.

Puzzles are all right. Navigation, though, is another story. In the beginning of the game, there is a canal you have to walk through. The way to continue is on the SIDE of a box, and the game doesn't give a hint where you're supposed to go. Batman gave subtle hints to the player through his inner thoughts in the Arkham games. Gordon Freeman didn't have to speak, but seriously, the exploration system definitely detracted from the experience.

Gun variety is HORRIBLE. You have to play with the same gun until you reach a certain point in which you can pick up a new gun. Rinse and repeat. Now, I know the generic alien army Combines are supposed to carry the same weapons, but couldn't the resistance give/modify cool weapons like in any good resistance story?

Conclusion: If you are willing to run around like Duke Nukem most of the game guns blazing, then spend your money on this. If you are willing to do puzzles, spend your money on this. If you are willing to wait a couple of levels to get a new gun, spend your money on this. I can barely recommend this game, because the playstyle it forced me to use made me more alert and fast. I can't say that I had a lot of fun, though.

Il Gioco.
[b]La Trama[/b]
Vestiamo i panni del grande Gordon Freeman che anni dopo il disastro di Black Mesa viene risvegliato dal noto G-Man e portato dentro City 17, il nostro eroe dovrà affrontare l'invasione della terra da parte dei Combine unendosi alla resistenza. Come trama è veramente spettacolare e più si andrà avanti più sarà intrigante. Inoltre questo gioco ha ispirato moltissimi altri videogiochi anche di stili differenti. Infatti Half Life contiene moltissimi generi: Horror, Comici, Azione e Zombie.
Io lo dico così sicuro anche perchè ho giocato Episodio 1 e 2. Se avete già giocato ad Half Life 2 è praticamente obbligatorio prenderlo, così almeno concluderete la trama del 2. Se non volete prenderli a prezzo intero i 2 episodi aggiuntivi, aspettate i saldi e li metteranno a circa 1,99.
[b]La Grafica[/b]
La grafica è meravigliosa per essere un gioco del 2004. Questo comunque non vuol dire nulla visto che la grafica è meravigliosa ancora oggi. E' tutto bello e realizzato nei minimi dettagli, soprattutto i volti hanno un espressività e una realtà pazzesca. Questo comunque è uno dei cavalli di battaglia di Valve e del suo source. In altri giochi di Valve le espressioni sono straordinarie (es: Left 4 Dead e TF2).
[b]L'ambientazione[/b]
L'ambientazione è veramente bellissima. Si passerà dalla città, alle fogne, alla spiaggia, ai boschi e tante altre. Tutto veramente molto vario!
[b]L'equipaggiamento[/b]
Saremmo dotati del famossisimo piede di porco e di tante altre armi tra cui: pistola, fucile a pompa, mitragliatrice e una pistola gravitazionale.
[b]La Durata[/b]
La durata varia da 14/15 ore. Se siete bravi a non morire magari lo finirete anche prima XD.
VOTO FINALE:100/100
